Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Bombchus (10 pieces)# and #a Game Key#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Spirit Temple Small Key# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Zora Tunic#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #a Heart Container#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path of time.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Goron Tunic# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #the Iron Boots# and #the Serenade of Water#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Zora Tunic#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #treasure chest game# grants #Din's Fire#.

HC (Malon).text: May the way of the Hero lead to the Triforce.

HC (Rock Wall).text: This isn't where I parked my horse!

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Jail Key#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Pouch of Silver Rupees for the Ice Cavern#.
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Ice Cavern Push Block)

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that within the #valley#, the crate and waterfall conceal...^ #a Forest Temple Small Key# and #a Pouch of Silver Rupees for the Spirit Temple#.
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Spirit Temple Sun Block)

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #2# major items.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #the Mirror Shield# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Pouch of Silver Rupees for the Ice Cavern# and #a Fire Temple Small Key#.
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Ice Cavern Spinning Scythe)

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Jabu Jabu's Belly## has #1# major item.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Jail Key#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

LW (Bridge).text: Gorons are stupid. They eat rocks. Except, apparently, the big rock blocking Dodongo's Cavern.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground MQ Underwater Silver Rupee Front Right
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Spirit Temple Adult Boulders)

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #8# major items.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #a Shadow Temple Small Key# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the path of #hearts#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Water Temple Small Key#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Water Temple Small Key#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Zora's Domain# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.
